de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.kmeans

Class FarthestPointsInitialMeans<V,D extends NumberDistance<D,?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.kmeans.AbstractKMeansInitialization<V>
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.kmeans.FarthestPointsInitialMeans<V,D>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - Vector type
    D - Distance type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    KMeansInitialization<V>, KMedoidsInitialization<V>

    public class FarthestPointsInitialMeans<V,D extends NumberDistance<D,?>>
extends AbstractKMeansInitialization<V>
implements KMedoidsInitialization<V>
    K-Means initialization by repeatedly choosing the farthest point. Note: this is less random than other initializations, so running multiple times will be more likely to return the same local minima.
